name: Reservations Agent/Специалист по бронированию
description:
Lotte Hotel Saint-Petersburg is looking for a proactive ,highly professional strong communicator, for a position Reservations Agent

Education / Experience requirements to candidates:

  • Natural hospitality and people oriented
  • Strong multi-tasking skills
  • Fluent English
  • Advanced Opera user

Responsibilities:

  • Responding to all guest requests, external and internal.
  • Responding to tourism web-sites requests.
  • Provides guests with information about hotel services
  • Handling booking requests in accordance with standards

Conditions:

  • Stable work in International Company
  • Schedule 2/2 or 5/2
  • Professional and friendly Hotel team
  • Modern environment and newest equipment
  • Social & Medical insurance
  • Complimentary employee meals and other benefits
